ela-app-layout.description:
Base App component. Pass a component map in props(required).
3 slots are available:
- default, which is the main content
- 'sidebar'
- 'header'

ela-content-layout.description:
Use as main content slot in App Layout.
5 slots are available:
- default
- 'head'
- 'tabs'
- filters
- 'foot'

ela-default-input.description: Wrapper for el-input with default option

ela-menu-items.description: Construct a nested el-menu with items array

ela-right-modal.description: Right Modal. Has a default slot. It's size is changable by dragging

ela-filter-item.description: For use in the 'filters' scope of content layout

ela-fieldset.description: Make a fieldset with optional legend

ela-schema-form.description: Make a dynamic form from jsonSchema, only simple array type schema object supported

modal-link.description: Create a router link to any right modal. Has a default slot
